stories.title: Finding time to work on a side project
Ethical, easy-to-use and privacy-conscious alternatives to well-known software

stories.text:
Hi HN!

With kids come a ton-load of laundry. How have you hacked this to get the optimal amount done with the least amount of effort?
stories.title: Ask HN: Engineers with kids, what processes have you built around laundry?

stories.text:
Hello all,

my name is Philipp, I'm a developer from Germany. I have been reading the posts here on HN for over 10 years.

Since half a year i am developing C-LISTS to help myself and others to run a productive and constant daily routine.

C-LISTS stands for checklists. Checklists that appear recurring daily, weekly or monthly and remind you of important tasks.

I am super excited and looking forward to your feedback.

An app will be available for Android in the next few days.
stories.title: Show HN: C-LISTS – Review and manage your daily routines
